description:
Create cifti with matching dense map.

This command helps you make a new dscalar, dtseries, or dlabel cifti file that matches the brainordinate space used in another cifti file.  The template file must have the desired brainordinate space in the mapping along the column direction (for dtseries, dscalar, dlabel, and symmetric dconn this is always the case).  All input cifti files must have a brain models mapping along column and use the same volume space and/or surface vertex count as the template for structures that they contain.  If any input files contain label data, then input files with non-label data are not allowed, and the -series option may not be used.

Any structure that isn't covered by an input is filled with zeros or the unlabeled key.

The <structure> argument of -metric, -label or -volume must be one of the following:

CORTEX_LEFT
CORTEX_RIGHT
CEREBELLUM
ACCUMBENS_LEFT
ACCUMBENS_RIGHT
ALL_GREY_MATTER
ALL_WHITE_MATTER
AMYGDALA_LEFT
AMYGDALA_RIGHT
BRAIN_STEM
CAUDATE_LEFT
CAUDATE_RIGHT
CEREBELLAR_WHITE_MATTER_LEFT
CEREBELLAR_WHITE_MATTER_RIGHT
CEREBELLUM_LEFT
CEREBELLUM_RIGHT
CEREBRAL_WHITE_MATTER_LEFT
CEREBRAL_WHITE_MATTER_RIGHT
CORTEX
DIENCEPHALON_VENTRAL_LEFT
DIENCEPHALON_VENTRAL_RIGHT
HIPPOCAMPUS_LEFT
HIPPOCAMPUS_RIGHT
INVALID
OTHER
OTHER_GREY_MATTER
OTHER_WHITE_MATTER
PALLIDUM_LEFT
PALLIDUM_RIGHT
PUTAMEN_LEFT
PUTAMEN_RIGHT
THALAMUS_LEFT
THALAMUS_RIGHT

The argument to -unit must be one of the following:

SECOND
HERTZ
METER
RADIAN

opt_unit_unit.title: opt_unit_unit
opt_unit_unit.description: select unit for series (default SECOND): unit identifier

anyOf.description: make a dtseries file instead of a dscalar

series.description: make a dtseries file instead of a dscalar

opt_from_cropped.title: opt_from_cropped
opt_from_cropped.description: the input is cropped to the size of the voxel data in the template file

anyOf.description: specify an input volume file for all voxel data

volume_all.description: specify an input volume file for all voxel data

opt_label_collision_action.title: opt_label_collision_action
opt_label_collision_action.description: how to handle conflicts between label keys: 'ERROR', 'SURFACES_FIRST', or 'LEGACY', default 'ERROR', use 'LEGACY' to match v1.4.2 and earlier

items.description: use input data from a cifti file

cifti.description: use input data from a cifti file

structure.title: structure
structure.description: which structure to put the metric file into

items.description: use input data from a metric file

metric.description: use input data from a metric file

structure.title: structure
structure.description: which structure to put the label file into

items.description: use input data from surface label files

label.description: use input data from surface label files

structure.title: structure
structure.description: which structure to put the volume file into

opt_from_cropped.title: opt_from_cropped
opt_from_cropped.description: the input is cropped to the size of the volume structure

items.description: use a volume file for a single volume structure's data

volume.description: use a volume file for a single volume structure's data
